DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Starts the entity moving to the position defined with a fix, a bearing, a range, and an altitude.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>fix</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Fix</myLabel> <myToolTip>The reference point</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Points</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllMoveToPointObjectsFilter;DtPointsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>bearing</myVariableName> <myType>heading</myType> <myLabel>Bearing</myLabel> <myToolTip>The bearing from the fix of the desired postion.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>range</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Range</myLabel> <myToolTip>The distance from the fix of the desired position.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>altitude</myVariableName> <myType>altitude</myType> <myLabel>Altitude</myLabel> <myToolTip>The altitude of the desired position</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
